Critical @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 2 rounds

Flashlight (Commercial).name: Flashlight (Commercial)
Flashlight (Commercial).description: A flashlight sheds bright light. A commercial flashlight emits light in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] (and dim light in the next 30 feet). A tactical flashlight emits its light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light in the next 60 feet) and is equipped with filters, which you can close to block or dim the light. Activating the filters takes an Interact action.

Flashlight (Tactical).name: Flashlight (Tactical)
Flashlight (Tactical).description: A flashlight sheds bright light. A commercial flashlight emits light in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] (and dim light in the next 30 feet). A tactical flashlight emits its light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light in the next 60 feet) and is equipped with filters, which you can close to block or dim the light. Activating the filters takes an Interact action.

Flight Suit.name: Flight Suit
Flight Suit.description:
Upgrades: 0

This comfortable coverall is made from lightweight thermal fabric and often adorned with patches displaying personal insignia, military rank, or even favorite hobbies or sports teams.

Fly Spell Amp.name: Fly Spell Amp
Fly Spell Amp.description:
Known on most worlds as "spell amps", spell ampoules are ready-to-use magic injections that confer the benefits of a spell of the specified rank.

Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

Effect 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8] spell

Force Field (Advanced).name: Force Field (Advanced)
Force Field (Advanced).description:
Force fields generate a personal barrier that absorbs damage. A force field's Hit Points are based on its version. While your force field is active, any physical or energy damage you would take is applied to the force field's Hit Points first, before being applied to your Hit Points (including temporary Hit Points). If damage from an attack or effect reduces the force field to 0 Hit Points, you take any excess damage, the force field deactivates, and it can't be activated again for 10 minutes. Force fields replenish the indicated number of Hit Points each round at the beginning of your turn while they're active.

The force field has 20 Hit Points, replenishes 4 Hit Points on your turn, and @Check[flat|dc:19].

@UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.WAXL7euS0jMn5oWi]{Effect: Force Field 20}

If your force field is tactical or better, it also protects you from deadly blows. Each time you're critically hit while your force field is active, attempt a flat check against the listed DC. On a success, it becomes a normal hit.

Activate—Raise Force Field 1 (manipulate)

Frequency three times per day

Effect Your force field becomes active. It remains active for 1 minute or until it's reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Force Field (Commercial).description:

@UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.WAXL7euS0jMn5oWi]{Effect: Force Field 37}

If your force field is tactical or better, it also protects you from deadly blows. Each time you're critically hit while your force field is active, attempt a flat check against the listed DC. On a success, it becomes a normal hit.

Activate—Raise Force Field 1 (manipulate)

Frequency three times per day

Effect Your force field becomes active. It remains active for 1 minute or until it's reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Force Needle.name: Force Needle
Force Needle.description:
Upgrades: 1

This subtle weapon resembles a grip without a blade. When a full vial of liquid is inserted into the bottom of the hilt, it generates a needle of pure energy to hold and inject the consumed dose of medicine or poison.

Frag Grenade (Advanced).name: Frag Grenade (Advanced)
Frag Grenade (Advanced).description:
Activate 1 @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire}

These fragmentary grenades explode in a cloud of shrapnel and deals @Damage[2d8[piercing]] piercing damage in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save.

Critical @Damage[1d4[persistent,bleed]] damage

Frag Grenade (Commercial).description:
Activate 1 @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire}

Frag Grenade (Elite).description:

Critical @Damage[1d6[persistent,bleed]] damage

Frag Grenade (Paragon).description:

Frag Grenade (Tactical).description:
Activate 1 @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire}

Critical @Damage[1d4[persistent,bleed]] damage

Frag Grenade (Ultimate).description:

Critical @Damage[1d8[persistent,bleed]] damage

Freebooter Armor.name: Freebooter Armor
Freebooter Armor.description:
Upgrades: 1

Freebooter armor is named for the pirates and outlaws who often wear these outfits. Freebooter armor typically consists of a breastplate worn under a jacket or flight suit, heavy boots and gloves, a helmet, and hidden straps and holsters for concealing weapons.

Frost Module (Commercial).name: Frost Module (Commercial)
Frost Module (Commercial).description: This module siphons the heat from the weapon's striking edge and ammunition, powering itself with the excess energy as it chills the air around it. It deals an additional @Damage[1d6[cold]] damage on a successful Strike. On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] save.

Frost Module (Tactical).name: Frost Module (Tactical)
Frost Module (Tactical).description:
This module siphons the heat from the weapon's striking edge and ammunition, powering itself with the excess energy as it chills the air around it. It deals an additional @Damage[1d6[cold]] damage on a successful Strike. On a critical hit, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] save.

Cold damage dealt by this weapon ignores the target’s cold resistance.

Ghost Killer.name: Ghost Killer
Ghost Killer.description: Mounted on the striking surface or barrel of your weapon, this upgrade lets you harm creatures without physical form. A ghost killer weapon is particularly effective against incorporeal creatures, which almost always have a specific vulnerability to ghost killer weapons. Incorporeal creatures can touch, hold, and wield ghost killer weapons (unlike most physical objects). A creature susceptible to ghost touch weapons (see Pathfinder) count ghost killer weapons as ghost touch.

Gill Sheath.name: Gill Sheath
Gill Sheath.description: Oxygen-filtering nodules line the outside of your lungs. If you breathe in water, the gill sheath filters the oxygen into your lungs. This allows you to breathe underwater or in the air. You exhale normally.

Glamer Projector.name: Glamer Projector
Glamer Projector.description:
Metal rings project holographic images onto your armor, completely hiding its real appearance. Glamer projectors come programmed with preset options including casual, corporate, and fashion. You can customize your glamer projector using a computer, like the one in your comm unit.

Activate—Glamerize! 1 (manipulate)

Effect You instantly change the appearance of your armor to any set of normal clothes or any other type of light or heavy armor. This upgrade is capable only of changing the appearance of your armor, not yourself or the rest of your equipment. You can copy the look of any type of clothing, but you don't gain any item bonuses provided by special types of clothing such as luxury fashion attire. Only a creature that is benefiting from truesight or a similar effect can attempt to disbelieve this glamer, opposed by your class DC.

Glow Up Spell Amp (Advanced).name: Glow Up Spell Amp (Advanced)
Glow Up Spell Amp (Advanced).description:
Known on most worlds as "spell amps", spell ampoules are ready-to-use magic injections that confer the benefits of a spell of the specified rank.

Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

Effect 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.5Rlci7rhYnFRHGt8] spell

Glow Up Spell Amp (Commercial).name: Glow Up Spell Amp (Commercial)
Glow Up Spell Amp (Commercial).description:
Known on most worlds as "spell amps", spell ampoules are ready-to-use magic injections that confer the benefits of a spell of the specified rank.

Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

Effect 1st-rank @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.5Rlci7rhYnFRHGt8] spell

Glow Up Spell Amp (Tactical).name: Glow Up Spell Amp (Tactical)
Glow Up Spell Amp (Tactical).description:
Known on most worlds as "spell amps", spell ampoules are ready-to-use magic injections that confer the benefits of a spell of the specified rank.

Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

Effect 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.5Rlci7rhYnFRHGt8] spell

Gluon Solarian Crystal (Advanced).name: Gluon Solarian Crystal (Advanced)
Gluon Solarian Crystal (Advanced).description: A gluon crystal harnesses entropy to cause serious lasting wounds. When you hit a creature with your solar weapon, you deal an extra 1d8 persistent bleed damage. On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until it recovers from the persistent bleed damage.

Gluon Solarian Crystal (Commercial).name: Gluon Solarian Crystal (Commercial)
Gluon Solarian Crystal (Commercial).description: A gluon crystal harnesses entropy to cause serious lasting wounds. When you hit a creature with your solar weapon, you deal an extra 1d4 persistent bleed damage. On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until it recovers from the persistent bleed damage.

Gluon Solarian Crystal (Superior).name: Gluon Solarian Crystal (Superior)
Gluon Solarian Crystal (Superior).description: A gluon crystal harnesses entropy to cause serious lasting wounds. When you hit a creature with your solar weapon, you deal an extra 1d10 persistent bleed damage. On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until it recovers from the persistent bleed damage.

Gluon Solarian Crystal (Tactical).name: Gluon Solarian Crystal (Tactical)
Gluon Solarian Crystal (Tactical).description: A gluon crystal harnesses entropy to cause serious lasting wounds. When you hit a creature with your solar weapon, you deal an extra 1d6 persistent bleed damage. On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until it recovers from the persistent bleed damage.

Graviton Solarian Crystal (Commercial).name: Graviton Solarian Crystal (Commercial)
Graviton Solarian Crystal (Commercial).description: A graviton crystal increases the flow of gravitons from your solar mote into your solar weapon, accelerating its impact and possibly trapping foes within its gravity field. When you hit a creature with your solar weapon while graviton attuned, you deal an extra 1d6 damage of your solar weapon's damage type. On a critical hit while you're graviton attuned, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn.

Graviton Solarian Crystal (Tactical).name: Graviton Solarian Crystal (Tactical)
Graviton Solarian Crystal (Tactical).description: A graviton crystal increases the flow of gravitons from your solar mote into your solar weapon, accelerating its impact and possibly trapping foes within its gravity field. When you hit a creature with your solar weapon while graviton attuned, you deal an extra 1d6 damage of your solar weapon's damage type. Additionally, when you hit an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} creature with your solar weapon while graviton attuned, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31] save or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. On a critical hit while you're graviton attuned, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for two rounds.

Grenade Launcher.name: Grenade Launcher
Grenade Launcher.description:
Activate 2 @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire}

The rotating barrel of this automatic breechloading launcher holds up to six grenades of any variety, allowing its wielder to choose a different grenade each time they fire. A grenade launcher is considered a martial ranged weapon, has reload of 2, and a range of 40 feet

Grindblade.name: Grindblade
Grindblade.description:
Upgrades: 1

The edge of this sword is composed of microsplitting nanoparticles that slice apart targets on a molecular level. The destructive capability of these make even the seemingly broad tip of a grindblade deceptively dangerous.

Gyrojet Pistol.name: Gyrojet Pistol
Gyrojet Pistol.description:
Upgrades: 1

Valued for its stopping power, this pistol sports a large caliber reinforced barrel designed to shoot tiny rockets capable of knocking enemies to the ground.

Hacking Toolkit.name: Hacking Toolkit
Hacking Toolkit.description: A hacking toolkit is required for Computers checks to Hack computers. You can use a hacking toolkit to access a computer without using a user interface, but this requires physical contact with the computer, or contact via an infosphere or similar linked network.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.description:
Upgrades: 1

Valued as both a crafting tool and an effective weapon, this hammer uses specially weighted heads and handles balanced for its wielders’ height and physiology to deliver maximum force with each strike.

Hardlight Handwraps (Advanced).name: Hardlight Handwraps (Advanced)
Hardlight Handwraps (Advanced).description:
Upgrades 2

These handwraps can be customized to shine in any color in the visible spectrum when used, and some manufacturers offer custom firmware that modifies their appearance to manifest as a claw, oversized fist, or hammerhead. These handwraps enhance your unarmed attacks as if they were manufactured weapons, allowing you to add an upgrade to your unarmed attacks. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes.

Your unarmed attacks gain the tracking +1 trait and increase the damage to two dice.

Hardlight Handwraps (Commercial).name: Hardlight Handwraps (Commercial)
Hardlight Handwraps (Commercial).description:
Upgrades 1

These handwraps can be customized to shine in any color in the visible spectrum when used, and some manufacturers offer custom firmware that modifies their appearance to manifest as a claw, oversized fist, or hammerhead. These handwraps enhance your unarmed attacks as if they were manufactured weapons, allowing you to add an upgrade to your unarmed attacks. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes.

Hardlight Handwraps (Elite).description:
Upgrades 3

These handwraps can be customized to shine in any color in the visible spectrum when used, and some manufacturers offer custom firmware that modifies their appearance to manifest as a claw, oversized fist, or hammerhead. These handwraps enhance your unarmed attacks as if they were manufactured weapons, allowing you to add an upgrade to your unarmed attacks. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes.

Your unarmed attacks gain the tracking +2 trait and increase the damage to three dice.

Hardlight Handwraps (Paragon).name: Hardlight Handwraps (Paragon)
Hardlight Handwraps (Paragon).description:
Upgrades 4

These handwraps can be customized to shine in any color in the visible spectrum when used, and some manufacturers offer custom firmware that modifies their appearance to manifest as a claw, oversized fist, or hammerhead. These handwraps enhance your unarmed attacks as if they were manufactured weapons, allowing you to add an upgrade to your unarmed attacks. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes.

Your unarmed attacks gain the tracking +3 trait and increase the damage to four dice.

Hardlight Handwraps (Superior).description:
Upgrades 2

These handwraps can be customized to shine in any color in the visible spectrum when used, and some manufacturers offer custom firmware that modifies their appearance to manifest as a claw, oversized fist, or hammerhead. These handwraps enhance your unarmed attacks as if they were manufactured weapons, allowing you to add an upgrade to your unarmed attacks. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes.

Your unarmed attacks gain the tracking +2 trait and increase the damage to two dice.

Hardlight Handwraps (Tactical).name: Hardlight Handwraps (Tactical)
Hardlight Handwraps (Tactical).description:
Upgrades 1

These handwraps can be customized to shine in any color in the visible spectrum when used, and some manufacturers offer custom firmware that modifies their appearance to manifest as a claw, oversized fist, or hammerhead. These handwraps enhance your unarmed attacks as if they were manufactured weapons, allowing you to add an upgrade to your unarmed attacks. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes.

Your unarmed attacks gain the tracking +1 trait.

Hardlight Handwraps (Ultimate).name: Hardlight Handwraps (Ultimate)
Hardlight Handwraps (Ultimate).description:
Upgrades 3

These handwraps can be customized to shine in any color in the visible spectrum when used, and some manufacturers offer custom firmware that modifies their appearance to manifest as a claw, oversized fist, or hammerhead. These handwraps enhance your unarmed attacks as if they were manufactured weapons, allowing you to add an upgrade to your unarmed attacks. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes.

Your unarmed attacks gain the tracking +3 trait and increase the damage to three dice.

Hardlight Series.name: Hardlight Series
Hardlight Series.description:
Upgrades: 1

A projector fastened to a belt or lapel encases the wearer's body in this shimmering hardlight shell. Military-issue hardlight armor follows a predictable standard, but private users enjoy a range of customizable fashion options.

Haste Spell Amp.name: Haste Spell Amp
Haste Spell Amp.description:
Known on most worlds as "spell amps", spell ampoules are ready-to-use magic injections that confer the benefits of a spell of the specified rank.

Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

Effect 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4] spell

Hidden Soldier Armor.name: Hidden Soldier Armor
Hidden Soldier Armor.description:
Upgrades: 1

This suit of heavy armor features a slitted helmet that reveals only the wearer's eyes. This ceramic suit consists of a breastplate, shoulder guards, bracers, and greaves that flex with the body's movements.

Hideaway Limb (Commercial).name: Hideaway Limb (Commercial)
Hideaway Limb (Commercial).description:
You can conceal items inside a hidden compartment in one of your limbs (such as an arm, leg, or tail) and protect them with a passcode. The compartment holds items of negligible Bulk and items of light Bulk that are small enough to fit in your limb or can otherwise be folded or contracted to fit. A hideaway in a leg (in a human) can typically hold more than one in an arm, and your size also adjusts the capacity at the GM's discretion.

When the compartment is closed, the seam in your limb is difficult to detect. You gain a +1 bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{Conceal an Object} in a hideaway limb. Though this compartment can foil a cursory pat down, many security checkpoints include a scan to detect such devices.

Activate—Draw 1 (manipulate)

Effect You Interact to draw an item @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} in your hideaway limb.

Hideaway Limb (Tactical).name: Hideaway Limb (Tactical)
Hideaway Limb (Tactical).description:
You can conceal items inside a hidden compartment in one of your limbs (such as an arm, leg, or tail) and protect them with a passcode. The compartment holds items of negligible Bulk and items of light Bulk that are small enough to fit in your limb or can otherwise be folded or contracted to fit. A hideaway in a leg (in a human) can typically hold more than one in an arm, and your size also adjusts the capacity at the GM's discretion.

When the compartment is closed, the seam in your limb is difficult to detect. You gain a +1 bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.qVNVSmsgpKFGk9hV]{Conceal an Object} in a hideaway limb. Though this compartment can foil a cursory pat down, many security checkpoints include a scan to detect such devices.

Activate—Draw 1 (manipulate)

Effect You Interact to draw an item @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} in your hideaway limb.

When you use Draw, if the item can be activated or otherwise used with a single action, you may use the item as part of the same action. For example, you Interact to draw a weapon, then Strike with that weapon.

Holoskin (Commercial).name: Holoskin (Commercial)
Holoskin (Commercial).description: A commercial holoskin is a holographic projector generally mounted to a belt or limb strap and activated as an Interact action. It can be programmed to project the appearance of another creature of the same size category as yourself, hiding your true appearance. A holoskin doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. The appearance of held and worn items aren't affected. You usually need a holoskin to set up a disguise in order to Impersonate someone using the Deception skill. A tactical holoskin adds a +1 item bonus to relevant checks.

Holoskin (Tactical).name: Holoskin (Tactical)
Holoskin (Tactical).description: A commercial holoskin is a holographic projector generally mounted to a belt or limb strap and activated as an Interact action. It can be programmed to project the appearance of another creature of the same size category as yourself, hiding your true appearance. A holoskin doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. The appearance of held and worn items aren't affected. You usually need a holoskin to set up a disguise in order to Impersonate someone using the Deception skill. A tactical holoskin adds a +1 item bonus to relevant checks.

Holospark.name: Holospark
Holospark.description: This tiny personal holoprojector is typically disguised as an earring, lapel pin, or pendant. A holospark has enough memory to store a simple visual projection of personal flair, such as a halo or wings, accompanied by short audio, such as a clip of a popular song or a sound effect. Your holospark can be programmed with a computer, such as the one in your comm unit.

Hygiene Kit.name: Hygiene Kit
Hygiene Kit.description: This kit contains all the tools and products needed to practice good grooming and hygiene. Kits designed for specific creatures include supplies (such as scale-care products for vesk or antennae grooming oil for lashuntas or shirrens) that are of less use to other creatures.

Hyper-Agility Enabler.name: Hyper-Agility Enabler
Hyper-Agility Enabler.description:
This augmentation enhances your muscles and nervous system to dramatically improve your flexibility and reaction time. You gain a +3 item bonus to Acrobatics checks. When you get this augmentation, you either increase your Dexterity modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever would give you a higher value.

Activate—Impossible Speed 1 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You become impossibly fast. Increase your base land Speed by 20 feet for 1 hour. This increase also applies to your Burrow, Swim, and Fly speeds if you have them. The combination of your speed and agility lets you react to danger and reorient yourself instantly; you can't be @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.enA7BxAjBb7ns1iF]{Suppressed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for the next minute.

Hypernerves (Advanced).name: Hypernerves (Advanced)
Hypernerves (Advanced).description:
Magical enhancements to your nervous system grant you uncanny reaction speed.

Activate—Engage Hypernerves F (concentrate)

Frequency three times per day (limit of once per round)

Trigger One of your reactions would trigger, but you have no remaining reactions

Effect You immediately gain a reaction and use it in response to the trigger. After using this reaction, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} on your following turn.

Hypernerves (Commercial).name: Hypernerves (Commercial)
Hypernerves (Commercial).description:
Magical enhancements to your nervous system grant you uncanny reaction speed.

Activate—Engage Hypernerves F (concentrate)

Frequency once per day

Trigger One of your reactions would trigger, but you have no remaining reactions

Effect You immediately gain a reaction and use it in response to the trigger. After using this reaction, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} on your following turn.

Hypernerves (Tactical).name: Hypernerves (Tactical)
Hypernerves (Tactical).description:
Magical enhancements to your nervous system grant you uncanny reaction speed.

Activate—Engage Hypernerves F (concentrate)

Frequency twice per day (limit of once per round)

Trigger One of your reactions would trigger, but you have no remaining reactions

Effect You immediately gain a reaction and use it in response to the trigger. After using this reaction, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} on your following turn.

Hypopen (Advanced).name: Hypopen (Advanced)
Hypopen (Advanced).description:
Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

This device contains specialized nanites that heal many sorts of mental and physical energies or temporarily boost the body's performance.

Remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} condition or decrease the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 1, or attempt a counteract check against one poison or disease afflicting the target, using the hypopen's item level in place of your spellcasting ability modifier and your Medicine proficiency bonus in place of your spellcasting proficiency bonus.

Hypopen (Commercial).name: Hypopen (Commercial)
Hypopen (Commercial).description:
Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

This device contains specialized nanites that heal many sorts of mental and physical energies or temporarily boost the body's performance.

Remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} condition or decrease the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 1.

Hypopen (Elite).name: Hypopen (Elite)
Hypopen (Elite).description:
Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

This device contains specialized nanites that heal many sorts of mental and physical energies or temporarily boost the body's performance.

Remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} condition or decrease the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 1, or attempt a counteract check against one poison or disease afflicting the target, using the hypopen's item level in place of your spellcasting ability modifier and your Medicine proficiency bonus in place of your spellcasting proficiency bonus, or end persistent poison or bleed damage, or or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl] for 1 minute. You can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.

Hypopen (Superior).name: Hypopen (Superior)
Hypopen (Superior).description:
Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

This device contains specialized nanites that heal many sorts of mental and physical energies or temporarily boost the body's performance.

Remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} condition or decrease the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 1, or attempt a counteract check against one poison or disease afflicting the target, using the hypopen's item level in place of your spellcasting ability modifier and your Medicine proficiency bonus in place of your spellcasting proficiency bonus, or end persistent poison or bleed damage.

Hypopen (Tactical).name: Hypopen (Tactical)
Hypopen (Tactical).description:
Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

This device contains specialized nanites that heal many sorts of mental and physical energies or temporarily boost the body's performance.

Remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} condition or decrease the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 1.

Hypopen (Ultimate).description:
Activate—Inject 1 (manipulate)

Remove the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} condition or decrease the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} condition by 1, or attempt a counteract check against one poison or disease afflicting the target, using the hypopen's item level in place of your spellcasting ability modifier and your Medicine proficiency bonus in place of your spellcasting proficiency bonus, or end persistent poison or bleed damage, or or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl] for 1 minute. You can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike, or gain fast healing 10 for 1 minute. If you have the drained condition, decrease its value by 1 instead of gaining fast healing.

Incendiary Grenade (Advanced).name: Incendiary Grenade (Advanced)
Incendiary Grenade (Advanced).description:
Activate 1 @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire}

These grenades use an ignited chemical to explode in a blast of intense heat and deal @Damage[2d8[fire]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save. If you have the critical weapon specialization of grenades, creatures who critically fail their saving throw against incendiary grenades are knocked away from the grenade.

Radius @Template[type:burst|distance:10]{10 ft} Critical 5 feet

Incendiary Grenade (Commercial).name: Incendiary Grenade (Commercial)
Incendiary Grenade (Commercial).description:
Activate 1 @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.oc0ZKnk5zD0GXqZi]{Area Fire}

These grenades use an ignited chemical to explode in a blast of intense heat and deal @Damage[1d8[fire]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save. If you have the critical weapon specialization of grenades, creatures who critically fail their saving throw against incendiary grenades are knocked away from the grenade.

Radius @Template[type:burst|distance:5]{5 ft} Critical 5 feet

Incendiary Grenade (Elite).name: Incendiary Grenade (Elite)
Incendiary Grenade (Elite).description:

Radius @Template[type:burst|distance:15]{15 ft} Critical 10 feet

Incendiary Grenade (Paragon).description:
